segments.text: I see the woman just standing there, drying dishes while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad, actually, how unaware she is of the mess and the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's just really tired or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on drying that plate, like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she realizes what's happening soon, before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad to see her so oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's had a long day or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks like she could use a break, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children don't get hurt while she's not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit sad to see her so absorbed in her task that she can't see what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
